entry.title: 2D materials-My understanding
entry.content:
我的PhD研究领域是2D materials的光学和电学性质，尤其是电子输运性质。
这里简单记录一些”科普向”的理解：

摘自https://www.scientificamerican.com/article/graphene-finally-gets-an-electronic-on-off-switch/:
“Semiconductors are defined by their band gap: the energy required to excite an electron stuck in the valence band, where it cannot conduct electricity, to the conduction band, where it can. The band gap needs to be large enough so that there is a clear contrast between a transistor’s on and off states, and so that it can process information without generating errors.”

entry.title: Youtube_8M[1]
entry.content:
* Youtube-8M Video Understanding Challenge
    It is about the Google Cloud & Youtube-8M Video Understanding Challenge hosted by Kaggle.com.
    Description:
    “Today, one of the greatest obstacles to rapid improvements in video understanding research has been the lack of large-scale, labeled datasets open to the public. For example, the availability of large, labeled datasets such as ImageNet has enabled continued breakthroughs in machine learning and machine perception. To that end, Google’s recent release of the YouTube-8M (YT-8M) dataset represents a significant step in this direction. Making this resource open to everyone from students and industry professionals is expected to kickstart innovation in areas such as representation learning and video modeling architectures.”
    The Entry Deadline for it: May 26, 2017.
    To be continued…
entry.summary:
* Youtube-8M Video Understanding Challenge
    It is about the Google Cloud &

entry.title: coding
entry.content:
好好研究了一下Matlab的3D画图功能，参考书籍是《精通Matlab》张志涌。才发现在plot3，meshgrid和surf三个基本命令之后，Matlab的潜能才刚刚是个开始。
    colormap加上shading，view，light，material，alpha几个参数命令，由colormap自然可以得到很多绚丽配色的图，惊喜是light和material的调整就好像摄影里的灯光和美工一样，能够立马让图像获得质感，可以制作符合出版要求的图像。
    同时，一个小发现是，github以及matlab自己的file exchange上，有很多人开发了各种matlab schemer，可以修改matlab的界面。尝试了之后觉得还不错，比较喜欢sublime的仿制版本。
    说到sublime这个被称作性感编辑器的家伙, 下载了之后打开确实小有惊艳，非常有质感的编辑器，加上那么高的灵活性和传说中的各种神插件。我就把它先默默放在那里吧，以后需要的时候，再好好研究一下。

    Coding…
entry.summary:

entry.title: 编辑室的故事
entry.content:
最近看完了《编辑室的故事》，除了被片尾曲些许着迷，更多的感叹是：

  “这人呐，贵在清醒”
  “打在胎里，随时可能流产；当妈的一口烟就可能长成畸形，长慢了心脏缺损，长快了就6指；扛过十个月，一不留神让产钳把脑袋夹扁了，都躲过去了。小儿麻痹，百日咳，猩红热，大脑炎，前面等着；哭起来呛奶，走起来摔跤，摸水水烫，碰火火燎；是个东西撞上就是半死，钙多了不长个，钙少了罗圈腿；混到能吃饭能出门，天上下雹子，地下跑汽车，大街小巷是个暗处就躲着坏人，赶上谁都是个九死一生。”
entry.summary:

entry.title: About Me
entry.content:
I am a PhD candidate at UC Riverside. I am now focused on semiconductor research and data science. This is a personal blog which I use to help organize my thoughts.

  My contacts are:
          Cell: +1 (951)-318-1339
          Email: kzhou003@ucr.edu
